column2: Claim Territory of Former General Government
During the War territory of Poland proper was transformed into General Government. Maybe we should think about re-incorporating this land into the Reich.
Finally! With our governments being compatible Italy can reunite once again.
Finally! With our governments being compatible Italy can reunite once again.

During WW2 Sweden remained neutral but this can't and will not last any longer, with Sweden in our sphere of influence and government sympathetic to the Reich we will be able to incorporate their state into our Germanic Union.

Despite the end of the WW2 many nationalists, that reject collaboration with Germany, and socialists, that couldn't accept defeat of Soviet Union, roam through the countryside causing great turmoil. We can only hope that situation doesn't get out of control.
Even before the war strife between the minorities was a problem in 2nd Polish Republic - now with the acquisition of new territories it's starting to reach even greater levels.
What do you mean? They don't want to speak Polish?!
Recent reports state that high profile socialist political prisoners were freed from the prison by armed partisans.
What's going on in this country!!!
Lwow, Krakow, Lodz, Warsaw, Poznan those cities were caught under riots, people are tired of post-war rationing and they demand better living conditions and relaxation of military law.

Food situation in cities is still dire and we have has to rely on mandatory grain supply enforced on the peasants, however the prolonging situation starts to spark discontent, among rural population, that sparked in the form of country wide protest.
Chaos in the south! Chaos in the east!

We are not quite sure yet what is happening but military forces were unable to stop the rioters and were forced to flee to central Poland to regroup, however they are assuring us that this situation is only temporary.

When the Germans came we were unable to stop them, yet we fought bravely even under the occupation, but the government... the government in London betrayed us! And now we socialists see, we patriots see no more German fabrications will cover the eyes of truth seekers the true enemy is fascism and our crypto-fascist overlords! No matter if your cause is simple welfare of the people that went into peril with Soviet tragedy or patriotic duty that pushes you forward. We shall be victorious and the traitors of the nation, traitors of the people, shall hang!
Death to all who oppose the will of the people and nations!
It's time to stop this madness!
Finaly we are victorious! Now it's time to decide wheather we want to establish separate states for each ethnicity or form federation of where everyone is equal.

Our new glorious federation has been established but it is yet to be decided what nature will it have, some people are proposing joint dictatorship of socialists and nationalist, some more radical ones vow for recreation of Soviet state, and even more radical people suggest combining socialist economy and slavic nationalism
column3: moderates, on the other hand, propose guided democracy.

column2: First anniversary of The Great War on Communism

The 5th of March 1953 marks the first anniversary of "The Great War on Communism" where nations of Europe and beyond united against the Bolshevik plague. On this day many parades were held around the World, but the biggest and the most splendorous one in Berlin where columns of soldiers and tanks rolled through the Brandenburg Gate accompanied by the highest officials of the Reich. Many prominent figures from other countries were also invated to the parade, including US Vice President Richard Nixon (who attended the event even despite US-German relations getting colder and colder) and Japanese Prince Mikasa. However the culminative moment of the whole event, our Fuhrer's speech, were yet to come.

Hitler wasn't as energetic as his younger self but for this great event he gathered all of the strength that was left in him to deliver the speech. In this speech he emphasised how great achievement the defeat of Soviet Union was and acknowledged the titanic sacrifice made by all nations and people that took part in this crusade. However to the shock of many he also announced his retirement, the post of Fuhrer and Chancellor were to be separated and held by Joseph Goebbels and Herman Goering respectively.
Now it's time for his prodigies to step into spotlight

Hitler's health was deterioration for a long time, which was kept secret from the public, however, now that he is dead it is of no use to hide his status - Yes Adolf Hitler is dead, to the shock and terror of many, or to joy of them...
Some will mourn him, some will curse his name.

Goering's addiction to heroine has been a nuisance since he took the chancellor's office, for some time now Martin Bormann has been serving as de facto head of government, but it can continue no more! It's time to choose replacement for Goering.
Borman is already familiar with the government, choose him!
We should choose Speer, Hitler's trusted architect!
Himmler and SS uses this occasion to size power!
Invite Strasser and reconcile with the former left wing of the party!
Invite Wehrmacht to the government to avert potential crisis!
Goebbels merges the posts and becomes true Fuhrer!
German Intervention in Polish Civil War
Now that Poland fell into disorder it's perfect ocasion to annex The Condominium of Danzig and maybe even more!
Size Danzig and demand former provinces of German Empire!
Size Danzig and demand territory annexed into the Reich durin WW2!
Germany is demanding territorial concessions, should we agree to their terms and not risk two front war or resist them?
Sad day for Poland it is.
German Intervention in Polish Civil War - Lithuania
Civil war is ravaging through Polish land, it could be an opportunity to enlarge our Baltic territory.
We won't intervene in this case
Germany demands that we surrender to them and transfer our territory to their Baltic puppet.
Never, we are fighting for freedom from oppression!
Who would even want their pathetic land!
Maybe baltic state isn't that bad...
Ukrainian Intervention in Polish Civil War
Since Poland is in disarray it rises great opportunity to reclaim our rightful Ukrainian land!
Ukraine demands that we surrender to them the land that they call theirs.
Give it to them, we has to focus on civil war
Polish rebels refused our demands in rather... impolite manner...
We are not ready for real war
I see... what happened wasn't enough for those Poles!
Russia demands ethinc land From Ukraine
Now that Ukraine is at war it is perfect occasion to demand ethnic Russian Territory back!
Demand all ethnically Russian territory and access to Crimea!
Russia issued ultimatum demanding it's old territory!
We don't want two front war...
Never, this land is vital to our national effort!
Russia issued ultimatum demanding it's old territory!
Ukraine is at war with Poland, perhaps we should intervene on Polish behalf, strong Ukraine means threat to Romania.

Ever since the failed landing in Normandy and reconciliation with Germany de Gaulle and Petain were forced to cooperate. Somehow they France was able to avert civil war (even with two hostile governments)... up until now, After failed coup attempt by Petain, or rather by de Brionon, since Petain is in reality bedridden, former Vichy Government fled from Paris to Marseilles gathering forces loyal to Petain's name. We have to retaliate with force!
After bloody civil war we were finally able to win! De Gaulle is now imprisoned and awaiting his trial.
German Intervention in French Civil War
Turmoil in France raises opportunity to size Luxembourg and Alsatian Condominium.
We need more room at the west!
Germany used our civil war as an opportunity to size Alsace, and now they are demanding even more territory what should we do?
Aggression has to be met with aggression!

New York Times published an article stating that anonymous informer provided them with detailed documentation of atrocities committed by the German National Socialist regime during WW2. What they did is... ... UNSPEAKABLE!

Volksinstitut fuer International Soziooekonomische Zusammenarbeit (People's Institute for International Socio-Economic Cooperation) - or VIISEZ in short, was German based organisation promoting social and economic cooperation among the countries with strong ties to the German Reich. It was established shortly after creation of Pact of Nations as, a second pillar of realising German international ambitions.
Reichsmarks will flow around the world!
Due to... recent events and pressure of public opinion we have no choice but to impose sanctions on Germany.
For now they will pay in money, maybe later in blood...

Due to recent... discoveries... American government government decided to impose on us economic sanctions. we will have to either have to wait for situation to calm down or find appropriate countermeasures to them.

With Cold War getting denser and denser German authorities came into realisation that they are no match to US economic might the only way forward is further Pan-Germanic Unification that will give the Reich possibility to compete with America on Equal Terms.
Phi... There is already no match for German power!

With Cold War getting denser and denser German authorities came into realisation that they are no match to US economic might the only way forward is further Pan-Germanic Unification that will give the Reich possibility to compete with America on Equal Terms.
We won't sacrifice even more of our sovereignty!
After initial hit, even despite, or maybe bacouse, of economic sanctions imposed by the US German economic was able to recover and reach unprecedented economic growth.
Ok I am going to buy a new car... and maybe tv!

Lebensborn e.V. (literally: Fount of Life") was an SS-initiated, state-supported, registered association in Nazi Germany with the goal of raising the birth rate of "Aryan" children of persons classified as "racially pure and healthy" based on Nazi racial hygiene and health ideology. Lebensborn provided welfare to its mostly unmarried mothers, encouraged anonymous births by unmarried women at their maternity homes, and mediated adoption of these children by likewise "racially pure and healthy" parents, particularly SS members and their families. The Cross of Honour of the German Mother was given to the women who bore the most "Aryan" children. Abortion was legalised by the Nazis for disabled children, but strictly punished otherwise." After many years of parental support programs they finally seem to give exponential results.

It was decided by the highest governmental figures that SS poses exponential threat to the Reich government and stability. This morning, wehrmacht disarmed all SS forces and imprisoned most of the SS officers including Reichsführer-SS Heinrich Himmler, now they are awaiting the trial. Operation seems to be major success, that proceed without any major incidents.
Ever Since the acquisition of power SS took steps in limiting Wehrmacht power, now Wehrmacht will officialy be integrated into Waffen-SS that will become German main military force.

Ever since the end of WW2 territory of Czechoslovakia was potential threat to our national security due to possibility of US and it's allies using it as operational base, and even worse, there are rumours that America may station their nuclear arsenal there, maybe we should pre-emptively strike before it is too late.
Contact the Volksdeutsche cells and prepare the coup!
No! We could as well make things worse...
Germany prepared the coup country is in chaos!.
After failed coup Czechoslovakia asks us for military assistance and protection!.
Establish our nuclear arsenal in Czechoslovakia!
America Establishes Nuclear Arsenal in Czechoslovakia
America established nuclear arsenal in Czechoslovakia, this time for real!.
Send our Nuclear Arsenal Greenland and St. Martin in Response!
Get out of this before it is too late!
Germany Militarises Greenland and St. Martin
In response to our actions Germany decided to send their Nuclear Bombs to Greenland and St. Martin.
It has gone too far, back down!
Our adversary decided to remove their nuclear arsenal from key points thus resolving the crisis.
Czechoslovak government were successfully overthrown by National Socialist sympathisers now we can decide what to do with former Czechoslovakia.
Integrate Bohemia and Moravia into Reich!
Czechian issue has been resolve now what to do with Slovakia....
Allow Hungary to annex Slovak lands
Create puppet state just as before
After recent events Ukraine is basically a dead state and this gives us opportunity to annex them.
Maybe we don't have that much in common with the US but we have one thing in common for sure - German threat.
Maybe we don't have that much in common with Russia but we have one thing in common for sure - German threat.

Germany, United Arab Republic and Iran have decided to sign trilateral trade agreement, Germany is to be supplied with the natural resources, especially oil, in exchange for economic and technological assistance.

Germany, United Arab Republic and Iran have decided to sign trilateral trade agreement, Germany is to be supplied with the natural resources, especially oil, in exchange for economic and technological assistance.
Swiss neutrality, was always.. problematic, maybe we could do something to influence their government and public opinion in favour of our country...
Swiss neutrality is useful for our intel

This is dark day for Switzerland left-wing terrorist cell commited act of terror on our land, many blame the weakness of federal government for the event. Due to public outcry we were forced to call extraordinary elections.
National Socialism will enforce strong state and protect us.
Truth about Swiss terrorist attack of 1977

New York Times once again published sensational information, this time about the German involvement in Swiss terrorist attack of 1977, public opinion is outraged and demand impeachment of the government.
Under public pressure military coups Nazi government
Swiss National Socialists Take Refuge in Germany

Our involvement in involvement in Swiss terrorist attack of 1977 was discovered and Swiss National Socialist government couped but they were able to fled persecution and took rafuge in the Germany with the petition to annex Switzerland.
Prepare military operation to take Switzerland back!
Conflict is not worth it, refuse petition

Although in theory our annexation of Switzerland was legal according to international law, in reality many countries are questioning it's legitimacy, maybe we could shut them by involving more countries and partitioning Switzerland.
Whole Swiss territory rightfully belongs to us!
We suffered humiliating defeat at the hands of the Swiss!

At the old age of 93 passed, Mussolini, the founder of fascist Italy, although for many years he barred little to not de facto political power he still was a symbol of Italian Social Republic. His death may open opportunity for opening the talks about Italian Reunification...

At the old age of 93 passed, Mussolini, the founder of fascist Italy, although for many years he barred little to not de facto political power he still was a symbol of Italian Social Republic. His death may open opportunity for opening the talks about Italian Reunification...
With Mussolini's death Germany used it as an occasion for talks about Italian reunification, and propose referendum.
US has agreed to reunify Italy now it's time to ask Italian's if they agree.
Now it's time for Pan-Italian referendum!
US has agreed to reunify Italy now it's time to ask Italian's if they agree.
Now it's time for Pan-Italian referendum!

After the US-German talks both super powers agreed the held Pan-Italian Referendum. South Italians has agreed in a referendum to unite Italy now it's time for the northerners to answer the question "Do you want Italy to be one again".
After the US-German talks both super powers agreed the held Pan-Italian Referendum now south Italians has to answer the question "Do you want Italy to be one again".

With years passing many members of National Socialist old guard are dying and their place is taken by new younger members of the party. Young people of the Reich are conflicted however, on one hand they grew in the time of unprecedented economic growth and German success and exhibit great patriotism, on the other hand they are fascinated by the outside world, their are no people inside the Reich to hate so they don't understand the hatred of older generations. Although their fascination with outside world is quite naive and paternalistic in nature, resembling 19th century orientalism, they still would like to experience freely the world's cultural richness, remembering of course about the merit of great Germanic culture.
Whoever controls the youth controls the future

With fall of the German regime all cracks in the system has become apparent, moods of the nations integrated by us swayed in the seconds and now they are wanting their independence and we can do nothing, the whole system was just overthrown and our military is powerless, it is the end of great German Reich...

Our Fuhrer Joseph Goebbels died peacefully in his sleep, it has come as a surprise to the many since he was in a good shape but it exposed one truth - our leadership is old and dying, stuck in the days long gone. Now it is the time of the young! And so it will be, the congress of NSDAP is held to elect new Fuhrer, and publish a new manifesto of National Socialism, and in this manifest a new idea is introduced, a new party's line is introduced, and this idea is called "Panweltisch Nationalsozialismus"! Racial rhetoric was smoothed out and new emphasis on cultural nationalism cooperation of nations and classes was put in the first place, and this all under leadership of Germanic culture, the greatest culture on Earth, why use force when it is only natural that eventually they will adopt German culture as their own, but we can compare and teach and absorb what little other have of value, we are great, we are strong, but we can be stronger, this is the new civilising mission! To assimilate the world is our principle! Some are weaker of course, but why look at them with disgust when we can paternally treat them with blissful pity... We have a will to power and, in an act of Colective Nietzscheanism, we shall decide our morality detached from the decadent past! No longer any nationality, any ethnicity is threat to our Reich... some things we did are unfortunate... misguided one may say... but on the mistakes we learn, evolve, and that is why we are great! But there is, indeed, one danger, one enemy... decadent American culture at which hands many young fall, it is time of war! Not conventional but cultural one! Only one may stand victorious and Cultural Darwinism shall dictate who wins, this war... this cold war... has only begun!
We are the Masters of the World and it is our duty to take care of it and its people!

Next big thing that the party congress introduced to the public was renaming NSDAP to NSGAP - "Nationalsozialistisch Germanisches Arbeiten Partei", to highlight more universal nature of new German nation. In addition to mere change of name greater representation was introduced for non core-German branches, like Danish or Dutch ones. Party also announced creation of new Pan-Germanic lingua franca based on existing langueges and reconstructed from old sources, party linguists claim that it is as close to the "original Germanic language" as possible.

Another matter raised at the congress was ethnic and cultural identity, according to new... research... all nations of earth are ethnically Germanic! Never the less Aryans posses certain cultural and spiritual redeeming qualities that were lost in more degenerate cultures, and it is our duty to bring them back on the right rails. Although eugenic program favouring external features were to be dropped, efforts in improving physical and intellectual capabilities were doubled, especially now that it isn't hindered by the appearance of participants. Last but not least the party intorduced new slogan - "Excellency in Homogeneity", highlighting collective individualism, of National Socialism.
You are honorary Aryan... and you... and you too! Everyone is!

The last thing discussed at the congress was the matter of German atrocities committed during the war, it was admitted that they happened but the whole blame was put on the SS and American-Masonic conspiracy that was behind all of this.
That seems far fetched... But okay!

One of catholic priests was recently caught spying for the US. Hostility of our leader toward religion was well known for quite some time and now that we have an excuse we can really consider full blown persecution. In his passionate speech the Fuhrer stated that we have to get rid of Vatican bugs that plague our country and that Christianity is the enemy of Germanic spirit, and that there can only be a state to which the people are loyal to, not some false idol that the church has become, but the state indeed the embodies the Germanic way of life, detached from from petite Judeo-Christian morality.
But religion can be useful to control the masses...

Ever since the dissolution of SS there was a vacuum in the government, Wehrmacht may serve its role as a military force and any threat from it is fading away as old Prussian class of generals is dying off, and new officers are loyal to the party, however there is considerable lack of militia and policing forces. That's why our government decided to create new force called "Volkslegion", "VL" in short. All police forces were absorbed into this new organisation as well ass remnants of Gestapo. It's roles will vary wildly, from seving as (secret) police force to organising local defences (however they are banned from using heavy equipment like tanks or artillery), public works, and even cultural events. Their role is to serve as an ultimate embodiment of total state, mobilising every part of society in every aspect. As opposed to the to the SS however VL was designed as more mass movement and is strictly controlled by the party, commanded directly from the Fuhrers Chancellery. Their uniforms are dark red, almost brown, some say that they are impractical on the battlefield and too easy to spot, other add that the colour was chosen on purpose on a request of Wehrmacht...
Everything in the state, nothing outside the state!

The war on religion has ended, many churches has been repurposed for public use and many members of the clergy... reeducated. No longer will any external force put pressure on the state, the state that have been cleansed of yet more undesirable elements. Now the only thing that our people will worship is the state and the party, the eternal, collective messiah that speaks the will of nature, the will of clocks of destiny, and our destiny is bright indeed!
Everything in the state, nothing outside the state!

Ever since Japanese government was couped a few months ago and their Ministry of War denounced peace treaty with the US, our navy was on high alert all this time enforcing total blockade on Japan to prevent them from rebuilding their military. Now during just after the Berlin parade (which both were attending) Prince Mikasa arranged secret meeting with our representative there - US vice-president Richard Nixon. Japanese prince is proposing organising overthrow of the Imperial Guard that is starting to enforce rule of terror. The question is - should we help in organising such venture.
Enemy of our enemy is our friend!
United States would never help organise a coup against foreign government!

Ever since the Imperial Guard overthrow our previous, treacherous government a few months ago and the Ministry of War denounced peace treaty with the US, American navy was on high alert all this time enforcing total blockade on Japan to prevent us from rebuilding our military. Now the people of Japan can see how those cowardly Yankees are hiding behind their floating fortresses, rejecting Japanese right to greatness and rule over all of Asia!
Such humiliating peace wasn't acceptable in the first place!

Now that our rule over Japan is standing firm, we can start to persecute the treacherous elements that caused our so called "defeat". We will start with the nave, it is their fault that that Americans were able to get so close to our home islands, we didn't loose at land, it is their fault, it all is their fault!!!

Even though our ground forces did not loose, there were officers that accepted the "defeat" and commenced retreat to the home islands. It is unacceptable for them to continue career, they also shall be tied for treason!

Some people are questioning our motives, and I say where were they when we signed the peace treaty? Where were they when popular uprising to restore glory for the emperor were needed?  They  shall  also  be  persecuted!
Hirohito Calls for Cessation of Persecutions

In his first public radio speech Hirohito (without the knowledge of government) called for the cessation of all persecutions and countrywide amnesty. We have to stop before nation devolves into chaos, he said, and that we have to preserve our dignity even in the face of defeat.
In response to his unauthorised endeavour, Emperor Hirohito was put under house arrest and is now even more closely monitored by Kenpeitai and Imperial Guard.
We will restore his glory whether hew wants it or not!

Hirohito's speach resulted in country wide protests against government, but the bigger threat are remnants of the Navy, dissident military units and democratic-socialist revolutionaries organising in the west around the Osaka, Hiroshima and Nagasaki, calling themselves "Japanese Patriotic Alliance for Freedom of Imperial House", or "Japanese Patriotic Alliance" in short. The truth is that uprising was planned for a long time but Hirohito's reckless, although noble, actions put things into motions too early. But now it is too late, dies has been cast and the rebels have only one message to the Ministry of War:

American's can't directly intervene in the conflict since it would cause patriotic uproar in favour of the Ministry of War and the Imperial Guard, but, as they promised, they will continue to provide material support for ass long as it is necessary.
We are Victorious and the emperor is finally free.
The conflict has ended in our victory and ultra-nationalists shall be judged, but we have to decide the shape of New Japan that will be born from all of those bloody infighting.
We will give the true power at the hands of Emperor!
Emperor will serve only as a symbol of Nation and guide us to democracy!
Power of a monarch is dangerous and can be used by vicious people - Declare the Republic!

We achieved victory against the vicious rebels but at what cost... Cyanide ampoule was smuggled into the Imperial Palace and Emperor Hirohito committed suicide seeing the defeat of revolutionaries as his personal defeat. Now Akihito shall ascend the throne and it is our duty to protect him at all cost!

Japanese Revolutionaries backed by us suffered a defeat in the civil war, but many including Prince Mikasa were able to escape through Hiroshima to Okinawa and than to Hokkaido, and now they are vowing to establish Japanese Republic there, but it all depends on our government whether we are willing to cede occupied Japanese territory to them.
I like the idea, let them establish it!
No, we still need strong military presence in the area

All of the fighting has caused so much destruction, that the situation devolved into countrywide famine, people are starving and if not American Blockade situation could be easily avoided, but it isn't too late maybe we can limit casualties by formally re-signing peace treaty with the US and opening up trade for so much needed food.
We will never negotiate with those Yankee dogs! It is all their fault!
And what were we fighting for? Eh... Sign it...
After all, at the face of disastrous famine, Japanese government decided to finally re-sign formal peace treaty with us in exchange for ending blockade and humanitarian aid.

Although misleading in name since it not only concern eastern land, program called "Neu Ostsiedlung" was proposed as an effort of colonisation and assimilation of territories that aren't ethnically German (yet), it also includes forceful relocation of non-German population deep into the Reich. The program is very ambitious and may demand some financial backing, it may also anger ethnic population. But it is yet to be decided whether the program will see its realisation.
We were able to win the civil war, now traitors will be judged for their crimes.
We suffered yet another humiliating defeat at the hands of the Germans...

With recent incorporations into the raich we ended up with Belgian Congo in our hand. What should we do with it? Should we just get rid of this territory or maybe we could renew our colonial ambitions?

Philippe  Petain has been bedridden for a few years now and all matters of former Vichy government were run by Fernand de Brinon. His death, however, is a sad thing, no matter on which side you stand, he was French hero after all!
Bucard and Doriot Asks for Support

Pro-Nationalist forces were able to defeat de Gaulle's regime but they are divided themselves and both Bucard and Doriot have come ask us for help promissing us some concetions in the future. We have worked with them before, perhaps it is great opportunity to end French threat once and for all by permanently installing subservient government there, however we are risking alienating existing French government in case Bucard and Doriot loose.
Build Friendly relations with existing French government

With support of the Reich Bucard and Doriot were able to gather enough forces to challenge new French government, now they proclaimed merging of their parties into one and creation of "French Social Republic". This marks the begging of the second phase of French Civil War.
Their betrayal will be met with death
All hail the new - Social - France
Bucard and Doriot were defeated and although they fled to Germany it is finally time for France to experience the period of peace... or so we hope.
Both de Gaulle's and Petain's minions were defeated, now it is time of new Social France, but first we have to release our promise to Germans...
It is small price for new society!

Fascist forces in the French civil war were victorious and as promised they will provide us with concessions. According to our agreement we will see the creation of Frankish Protectorate. Although formally still under French authority, Frankish Protectorate will be special zone, with it's own autonomous local government, economy and policies. Everything, of course, under German headship.
It is small price for new society!

Ever since the failed landing in Normandy and reconciliation with Germany de Gaulle and Petain were forced to cooperate. Somehow they France was able to avert civil war (even with two hostile governments)... up until now, After failed coup attempt by Petain, or rather by de Brionon, since Petain is in reality bedridden, former Vichy Government fled from Paris to Marseilles gathering forces loyal to Petain's name.
